title: Inquiry-Based Ecology Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Focuses on designing inquiry activities that enable students to apply ecological education methods in real-world settings, conducted through a blended approach of online (theory/discussions) and offline (fieldwork/lab activities) components.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core ecology concepts (e.g., biodiversity, ecosystem interactions).
Learners can develop ecology education modules by applying inquiry-based learning design principles.
Learners can measure learning effectiveness and propose improvement strategies using formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
